document_data.name: Jaesor's Fineware Porcelain Works
document_data.mainbody: '''Jaesor's Fineware Porcelain Works''' was a shop located in [[Neverwinter]] in the 14{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Jaesor's was located in the northwestern end of the [[Blacklake District]], next to [[Dannar's Mechanical Marvels]] in the intersection between [[Hantor's Lane]] at the [[Street Of Storms]].{{cite web|author=[[Ed Greenwood]]|title=Ed's Twitter|url=https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/967970877538275328|accessdate=2018-02-24}}

Description.Prices: A custom-paint plate cost 20 [[gp]], while a matched-set of 20 cost 45 gp.
